# Fool's Forbiddance (Spell)
## Overview
[[Abjuration Spells|Abjuration]] \[[[Mind-Affecting Spells|mind-affecting]]]

**Level:** [[6th Level Bard Spells|Bard 6]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 12th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 12]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S, M (a ring of keys)

**Range:** 10 ft.

**Area:** 10-ft.-radius spherical emanation centered on you

**Duration:** Concentration

**Saving Throw:** Will partial

**Spell Resistance:** Yes

**Source:** Advanced Player's Guide, pg. 224

Through your antics and performance, you create an area of warding that adversely affects all enemies that dare enter it. When an enemy creature enters the area it must make an immediate Will saving throw. If it fails, the creature is [[Confused|confused]] as long as it is in the area and for 1 round after it leaves. If it succeeds on the saving throw, the creature is [[Staggered|staggered]] as long as it is in the area and for 1 round after it leaves.
